text: The 2017 FIBA 3x3 U18 World Cup, to be hosted by China, will be an international 3x3 basketball event that will feature separate competitions for men's and women's under-18 national teams. The tournament will be held in Chengdu in front of the New Century Global Center. It was co-organized by the FIBA. ==Participating teams== The FIBA 3x3 Federation Ranking was used as basis to determine the participating FIBA member associations. ===Men=== {| |valign="top" width=20%| ;Group A * * * * * |valign="top" width=20%| ;Group B * * * * * |valign="top" width=20%| ;Group C * * * * * |valign="top" width=20%| ;Group D * * * * * |} ===Women=== {| |valign="top" width=20%| ;Group A * * * * * |valign="top" width=20%| ;Group B * * * * * |valign="top" width=20%| ;Group C * * * * * |valign="top" width=20%| ;Group D * * * * * |} ==References== ==External links== *Official website 2017 Category:2017 in 3x3 basketball Category:Sport in Chengdu Category:International basketball competitions hosted by China Category:2017–18 in Chinese basketball Category:June 2017 sports events in Asia Category:July 2017 sports events in Asia
title: 2017 FIBA 3x3 U18 World Cup
